course.subject: CIVL
course.name: Academic and Professional Development II
course.description: Continuation of CIVL 1010. Graded P, PP or F.

reviews.author: SQ Flyer
reviews.title: FALL 20 + Spring 21
reviews.comment_content:
2 Advisory meeting, one in the first few weeks of the semester and one at the end of the semester. Some simple chit chatting on academic matters will be fine.

Number of seminars depends on Department's arrangement.
In Fall 2020, way more seminars are provided.
One from HKCA YMS and Wuzhiqiao
One from AECOM & Arup (geotechnical projects e.g. Central Wan-Chai Tunnel and Heung Yuen Wai Border Station)
One from HKIE Civil Section
One from HyD & AECOM on Tuen Mun- Chek Lap Kok Tunnel
(technical sharing)
One workshop on Cover Letter writing

In Spring 21,
YMS Career Talk
GIS Applications Sharing
CV Writing
ICE/HKIBIM Sharing
reviews.comment_teaching: This semester the seminars are way more organized and provide more insights, sharing from engineers in the field and the respective organizations help students to understand the latest practice.
reviews.comment_grading:
P/F Course with compulsory attendance for every seminar and advisory meetings.

Please hand in the reflections on time or else you will get a Fail Grade.
reviews.comment_workload: Medium workload depending on the number of seminars and workshops organized in the semester. Usually after the seminars, a reflection with around 2 pages is required. The essay question will be posted on Canvas.

reviews.author: 準雷
reviews.title: 聽talk既course
reviews.comment_content:
Year 3 CIVL必修 係一年course

Fall Term
聽3次talk
其中1次係教寫CV同埋cover letter
每次都係出面既工程師/在職既人講
每次都要寫一篇reflective essay
見advisor 2次

Spring Term
只係聽2次talk
每次都係出面既工程師/在職既人講
每次都要寫一篇reflective essay
見advisor 2次
reviews.comment_teaching:
啲talk都係講行內既野
好多人問問題成日overrun
無興趣既話進入AFK模式就得
